youtube:
Don nemo bayanan RTMP ɗinku na YouTube, shiga cikin asusun YouTube ɗinku sannan ku kewaya zuwa CREATE> Tafi kai tsaye. Za ku ga allon mai zuwa:
{999}
. Kwafi "Stream URL" kuma saka shi a cikin filin "Manna RTMP URL nan". Na gaba, kwafi "Stream key" kuma manna shi zuwa filin "Stream key". Danna "Tafi Live" don fara gudana kai tsaye.
{1000}
facebook:
Kuna iya jerawa zuwa bayanin martaba ta hanyar RTMP daga Shafin Ƙirƙirar Live na Facebook (da danna Ƙirƙiri Live Stream) ko ta danna maɓallin Live a cikin Ƙirƙiri yankin shafi ko bayanin martaba wanda kuke son jerawa. Za a kawo ku zuwa ga Mawallafin Live na Facebook.
Gungura ƙasa ƙasa mai kunna samfoti. Tabbatar a ƙarƙashin "Farawa" an saita menu na zaɓuka zuwa Amfani da Maɓallan Rafi. Za ku sami URL na RTMP da Maɓallin Rarraba don wannan wurin. (A kula: Ana iya ganin samfotin bidiyon ku a ƙasan kusurwar dama.) {{facebookLive}} Kwafi "Url Server" kuma saka shi cikin filin "Manna RTMP URL nan". Na gaba, kwafi "Stream key" kuma manna shi zuwa filin "Stream key". Danna "Tafi Live" don fara raye-raye.
{1000}
